vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
ISTOStorage.endTime should be constant (ISTOStorage.sol#16)
ISTOStorage.investorCount should be constant (ISTOStorage.sol#20)
ISTOStorage.isFinalized should be constant (ISTOStorage.sol#28)
ISTOStorage.pausedTime should be constant (ISTOStorage.sol#18)
ISTOStorage.preMintAllowed should be constant (ISTOStorage.sol#26)
ISTOStorage.startTime should be constant (ISTOStorage.sol#14)
ISTOStorage.totalTokensSold should be constant (ISTOStorage.sol#24)
ISTOStorage.wallet should be constant (ISTOStorage.sol#22)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in ISTOStorage.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.5.8 (ISTOStorage.sol#3): it allows old versions

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
